title: TESTING AND VERIFICATION OF ELECTRICAL WORK
fullText:
Prior to placing an electrical installation, or any part thereof, in service following construction, alteration, addition or repair, it shall be verified, as far as practicable, that the installation is safe to energize and will operate correctly in accordance with the requirements of this Standard.
To confirm that the requirements of this Standard have been met, after completion, but before being placed in service, the installation shall beâ€”
(a)	inspected as far as is practicable; and
(b)	tested and verified in accordance with Appendix B of this Standard and AS/NZS 3000.
Test equipment shall have an accuracy of 10%.
